name: Chicken Shooter:Farmer Hunting
description:
Chicken Shooter: Farmer Hunting is the most amazing shooting chicken games start hunting on the farm and in the city tour to hunt the scared chicken with chicken hunting game. This is exactly what you want in the chicken shooter games multiple chickens variety and with different shooting guns . In this shooting chicken games you have the different environment of chicken hunter in each level and every level have the different number of chickens with the limited number of bullets for farm chicken gun game and time clear every level within given time you offered for chicken farm.
Features:
- Best hunting experience by shooting chicken
- Tons of challenging flying chicken hunting missions
- Breathtaking environment like chicken hunting game
- Smooth controls for best chicken shooting experience
- Stunning graphics and realistic hunting chicken animations
- Reasonable and Realistic 3D environment.
- Prey or hunt to animals.
